fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Visit a target. They will deal a Basic attack to themself at the end of the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are roleblocked, your roleblocker will deal a Basic attack to themself.
- If your roleblocker dies, the roleblock attempt will fail.
- Roleblockers that target you will have their wills covered in blood, making it unreadable.
- At night, you may choose to spare roleblockers instead, and they will not deal a Basic attack to themself.
- While you do still visit your targets, you do not count as attacking them. This means that you do not trigger effects such as the Superguard's (172) counterattack.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
"They appear to have committed suicide, with the number "2227" written on the ground in their own blood." (Day, Cause of Death message)
"You attacked yourself, but you survived!" (Visited by 2228, with at least Basic defense)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Let all who would oppose you die.
